title: Twisted and Broken
description: The first time I see her...she attempts to seduce and kill me.  A minute later...I notice the tattoo on her wrist.  Fifteen minutes later...I'm holding her hostage.   When thirty-six hours pass by- I finally know who she is...and I have to keep her identity a secret.   After a week together...she's driving me insane.  After 2 weeks together...she's making me smile.  After a month together...I'm feeling things I swore I would never let myself feel again.   And the second I realized I loved her...was the moment I knew I had to let her go.   This book is part of a 4 book series: Twisted Fate (Book One) Twisted Wrath (Book Two) Twisted Love (Book Three) Twisted & Broken (Book Four- Moe's book)  Side Note: Although the first and last books aren't, the entire series is considered a dark read. You've been warned.  ***Warning*** This series is not suitable for readers under 18. This series contains elements of emotional, sexual, and physical cruelty. Any readers with sensitivity to the above topics should proceed with caution, and at their own risk.
author: Ashley Jade
